headline: The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF Loaded Up on Energy Stocks. Here Are the Top 3.
summary: The Schwab US Dividend Equity ETF uses a fairly complicated selection process when it buys stocks.  The Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF (NYSEMKT: SCHD) is one of the most popular dividend exchange-traded funds (ETFs) you can buy.  Targeting well-run companies that have high yields, the Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF's recent rebalancing suggests that energy stocks could be a place for dividend investors to focus on today.
